    /**
 * Solves equations of the form a * x = b. Returns the value
 * of x.
 * @version 1.2.3
 * @tutorial solver
 */
function solver(a, b) {
  return b / a;
}

    /** @constructor */
function Greeter(name) {
  setName.apply(this, name);
}

/** @this Greeter */
function setName(name) {
  /** document me */
  this.name = name;
}
    @constant (@const)
